org.jlinalg
Class ComplexMatrix

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.Matrix<Complex>
      org.jlinalg.ComplexMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ComplexMatrix
extends Matrix<Complex>

An explicit implementation of Matrix in order to cater for the special behaviour of the method hermitian()

Author:
???, Georg Thimm

Method Detail

hermitian

public Matrix<Complex> hermitian()
Returns a matrix that is this Matrix hermitianly transposed. For almost all matrices this method is equivalent to transpose. But in case of complex number entries the matrix will be transposed and all entries will be conjugated as well.

Overrides:
hermitian in class Matrix<Complex>
Returns:
hermitianly transposed matrix
